summary: How many stories can one hotel room tell? Watch as five couples in different stages of relationships reveal what they really want to each other.
cast: Joelle Carter|Matthew Del Negro|Sarah Jenkins|Michael Knowles|Michael Laurence|Jennifer Marlowe|Michael Mosley|Robyn Myhr|Todd Swenson|Monique Vukovic|Laura Knight|Ray Wineteer
title: Room 314
